data.actual_result: You only see the server icon and Join/Open {servername} depending if you are in the server or not
data.expected_result: Chat bar would go down, seeing the full preview of the server you're going to
data.short_description: Chat bar doesn't go off when it's opened and tapped on a server invite
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an invite to any server - Post it in chat ( Can be server or dm ) - Tap on the chat bar - Tap on the server invite while the bar is active
